suite.name: TestCases Gmail

kw.name: Import Resource
kw.doc: Imports a resource file with the given path.

test.name: Validate that All Elements are Present on Gmail Login Landing Page

kw.name: Open Gmail
kw.doc: *Keyword to Open Gmail Website on desktop (does not require any parameters)*

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Maximize Browser Window
kw.doc: Maximizes current browser window.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Get Element Attribute
kw.doc: Returns the value of ``attribute`` from the element ``locator``.

kw.name: Run Keyword If
kw.doc: Runs the given keyword with the given arguments, if ``condition`` is true.

arguments.arg: GMail Login locale same as expected; skipping language selection.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

arguments.arg: GMail Login locale same as expected; skipping language selection.

kw.msg: GMail Login locale same as expected; skipping language selection.

kw.name: Sleep
kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Should Be Visible
kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Verifies that the element identified by ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Closes the current browser.

kw.msg: GMail Login locale same as expected; skipping language selection.

kw.doc: Pauses the test executed for the given time.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.

kw.name: Close Browser
kw.doc: Closes the current browser.
